name: hwpizza
description: A tool to cut a web-based PPT into short images as you wish.

scripts.dev: rd /s/q localServe && mkdir localServe && fis3 server start --root ./localServe --port 1234 --type node & fis3 release -wL
scripts.build: rd /s/q dist && mkdir dist && fis3 release prod -d ./dist

author: Eason@zone
